name: Cartoon Play Soccer
description:
Cartoon Play Soccer is a casual football/soccer game.

Play with some of the best Cartoon football teams in the world
Be a superstar on the stadium, and take on the World with your football skills. Make sure to win every match as you march towards glory.

**Very simple gameplay
**3D graphics
**Free to play
** 3 vs.3 , 2 vs. 2 and championship mode available
** different difficulty levels
** accumulate skill points for defense, offensive, passing, shooting and running
** train your skills by playing daily to improve and avoid losing skills
